item.description: Item No PN062 -Panerai Box & Warranty Card BRAND Panerai MODEL Luminor 1950 Pam00441 SERIAL/YEAR Current CASE DIAMETER 44mm DIAL Black Under certain circumstances, an advertised item may be out of stock. DESCRIPTION Home Panerai Luminor 1950 3 Days Gmt Automatic Ceramica 44mm Black Dial Men's Watch Pam00441 Titanium case with a brown leather strap. Titanium bezel. Brown dial with index-Arabic numerals hour markers. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Date display at the 3 o'clock position. One- small seconds subdials. Panerai Calibre P.9010 automatic movement with a 3-day power reserve. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Case size: 44 mm. Cushion case shape. Water resistant at 30 meters / 100 feet. Functions: date, hour, minute, second. Luxury watch style. Watch label: Swiss Made. Panerai Luminor Marina 1950 Brown Dial Automatic Mens Brown Leather Watch PAM01351
